Top.name: The Daily
Top.description: This moment demands an explanation. This show is on a mission to find it. Only what you want to know, none of what you don’t.

Top.name: Conan O'Brien Needs A Friend
Top.description: Conan O'Brien Needs a Friend is a weekly opportunity for Conan to hang out with the people he enjoys most.

Top.name: ID10T
Top.description: Nerdy nerdness comedy podcast w/ Chris Hardwick.

Top.name: The Next Big Idea
Top.description: THE NEXT BIG IDEA brings you the most groundbreaking ideas that have the power to change the way you live, work, and think.

Top.name: Stuff You Should Know
Top.description: Josh and Chuck as they explore the Stuff You Should Know about everything from genes to the Galapagos.

Top.name: Dennis Miller Option
Top.description: Join Emmy Award-winning comedian Dennis Miller, his A-list friends, and his "Guy Friday" Christian Bladt each week for their uncensored take on current events, politics, pop culture, and anything else on their minds.

Top.name: Radiolab
Top.description: Radiolab is a show about curiosity. Where sound illuminates ideas, and the boundaries blur between science, philosophy, and human experience.

Top.name: This American Life
Top.description: This American Life is a weekly public radio show, heard by 2.2 million people on more than 500 stations.

Top.name: S-Town
Top.description: A new podcast from Serial and This American Life, hosted by Brian Reed, about a man named John who despises his Alabama town and decides to do something about it.

Top.name: Man in the Window
Top.description: Paige St. John, a Pulitzer Prize winning investigative reporter has uncovered never before revealed details about the man who would eventually become one of California's most deadly serial killers.

Top.name: Dan Carlin's Hardcore History
Top.description: This isn't academic history but the podcast's unique blend of high drama, masterful narration.

Top.name: Hidden Brain
Top.description: The Hidden Brain helps curious people understand the world – and themselves.

Top.name: TED Talks Daily
Top.description: TED is a nonprofit devoted to Ideas Worth Spreading.

Top.name: Fresh Air
Top.description: Hosted by Terry Gross, the show features intimate conversations with today's biggest luminaries.

Top.name: Invisibilia
Top.description: Invisibilia is about the invisible forces that control human behavior – ideas, beliefs, assumptions and emotions.

Top.name: The Shrink Next Door
Top.description: The Shrink Next Door is a story about power, control and turning to the wrong person for help for three decades.

News.name: CNN
News.description: A 10-minute digital news show that serves a growing audience interested in compact on-demand news broadcasts.

News.name: CBS Evening News
News.description: Listen to the flagship daily evening newscast on your schedule

News.name: MSNBC Rachel Maddow
News.description: A smart look at politics, policy, and all the day's top stories.

News.name: Anderson Cooper 360
News.description: Anderson Cooper brings you highlights from CNN's premier nightly news program AC360.

News.name: Erin Burnett OutFront
News.description: Erin Burnet OutFront: Out in the field. In front of the headlines. A courageous and unconventional nightly news program.

News.name: BBC Six O'Clock News
News.description: The latest national and international news from BBC Radio 4

News.name: Presidential
News.description: The Washington Post's Presidential podcast explores how each former American president reached office, made decisions, handled crises and redefined the role of commander-in-chief.

News.name: Pod Save America
News.description: Four former aides to President Obama are joined by journalists, politicians, comedians, and activists for a freewheeling conversation about politics.

News.name: NPR Politics Podcast
News.description: The NPR Politics Podcast is where NPR's political reporters talk to you like they talk to each other.

News.name: Wait Wait... Don't Tell Me!
News.description: NPR's weekly current events quiz. Have a laugh and test your news knowledge while figuring out what's real and what we've made up.

Tech.name: This Week in Tech
Tech.description: Join the top tech pundits in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech.

Tech.name: Tested
Tech.description: Posted on Tuesdays, Norm and Will discuss topics of interest with Adam--nothing is off-limits!

Tech.name: Science Rules! with Bill Nye
Tech.description: Bill Nye is on a mission to change the world— one phone call at a time. He’ll tackle your curliest questions on just about anything in the universe.

Tech.name: Android Central
Tech.description: The premiere source for weekly news, reviews, interviews, opinions and an all-around good time, brought to you by the fine folks here at Android Central.

Tech.name: The Engadget Podcast
Tech.description: A weekly news show where your favorite Engadget editors tear themselves away from their crippling technology addiction, to discuss our collective crippling technology addiction.

Tech.name: Accidental Tech Podcast
Tech.description: Three nerds discussing tech, Apple, programming, and loosely related matters.

Tech.name: MacCast
Tech.description: A podcast for Mac geeks by Mac geeks

Tech.name: PC Perspective
Tech.description: The editors of PC Perspective discuss the latest in-house product reviews and news from around the world that pertains to technology and PC hardware.

Tech.name: The Tech Guy
Tech.description: No one does a better job of explaining technology, computers, and the Internet than Leo Laporte.

Tech.name: Ctrl Alt Delete
Tech.description: Emma Gannon - Blogger, Author, Podcast Host

Tech.name: Security Now
Tech.description: Steve Gibson, the man who coined the term spyware and created the first anti-spyware program, creator of Spinrite and ShieldsUP, discusses the hot topics in security today with Leo Laporte.

Tech.name: The Vergecast
Tech.description: This Vergecast is your source for an irreverent and informative look at what's happening right now (and next) in the world of technology and gadgets.

Tech.name: CNET
Tech.description: CNET is the world's leader in tech product reviews, news, prices, videos, forums, how-tos and more.

Tech.name: Tech News This Week
Tech.description: Digital expert, national radio host and USA Today columnist Kim Komando wastes no time and gets right to the top stories, scams, security alerts, product reviews and crazy happenings in the world of tech.

Gaming.name: Giant Bombcast
Gaming.description: The Giant Bomb staff discuss the latest video game news and new releases, taste-test questionable beverages, and get wildly off-topic in this weekly podcast.

Gaming.name: IGN
Gaming.description: All of IGN.com's video game podcasts jammed into one feed. It's like one of those little clown cars, but for your ears.

Gaming.name: Rooster Teeth Podcast
Gaming.description: Listen to the Rooster Teeth crew talk about all aspects of the gaming industry as both fans and as people who have worked in the game industry for over ten years.

Gaming.name: Game Informer
Gaming.description: Game Informer's staff break down the week's biggest releases

Gaming.name: Game Scoop
Gaming.description: IGN.com shoots a week’s worth of gaming news straight into your ear!

Gaming.name: Go Nintendo
Gaming.description: The GoNintendo Podcast is ripe with Nintendo news, brought to you once every week.

Business.name: The Tim Ferriss Show
Business.description: Tim Ferriss is a self-experimenter and bestselling author.

Business.name: Planet Money
Business.description: The economy, explained, with stories and surprises.

Business.name: Problem Solvers
Business.description: Problem Solvers with Jason Feifer features business owners and CEO’s who went through a crippling business problem and came out the other side happy, wealthy, and growing.

Business.name: TEDTalks Business
Business.description: Some of the world's greatest innovators, entrepreneurs, and business researchers share their stories and insights from the stage at TED conferences.

Business.name: The Dave Ramsey Show
Business.description: The Dave Ramsey Show is about real life and how it revolves around money.

Business.name: How I Built This
Business.description: A podcast about innovators, entrepreneurs, and idealists, and the stories behind the movements they built.

Comedy.name: Joe Rogan Podcast
Comedy.description: The podcast of Comedian Joe Rogan.

Comedy.name: WTF with Marc Maron Podcast
Comedy.description: Comedian Marc Maron is tackling the most complex philosophical question of our day.

Comedy.name: Kevin Pollak's Chat Show
Comedy.description: Kevin Pollak’s Chat Show is a podcast and live streaming video talk show

Comedy.name: Real Time with Bill Maher
Comedy.description: Download and watch full episodes of Real Time with Bill Maher including his New Rules and Overtime segments with his guest panelists.

Comedy.name: Keith and The Girl
Comedy.description: If you're easily offended, this podcast is not for you. Keith and The Girl (KATG) is a fast-paced comedy show that talks about EVERYTHING.

Comedy.name: Comedy Bang Bang
Comedy.description: A weekly podcast that blends conversation and character work from today's funniest comedians.

Comedy.name: Gilbert Gottfried's Amazing Colossal Podcast
Comedy.description: Comedian and actor Gilbert Gottfried talks with the show business legends, icons and behind-the-scenes talents who shaped his childhood and influenced his comedy.

Comedy.name: Life is Short
Comedy.description: Justin Long gets personal with all kinds of people, from actors to musicians to deep thinkers who fascinate him.

Comedy.name: Anna Faris Is Unqualified!
Comedy.description: Not-so-great relationship advice from completely unqualified Hollywood types.

Sports.name: The Bill Simmons Podcast
Sports.description: HBO and The Ringer's Bill Simmons hosts the most downloaded sports podcast of all time

Sports.name: 30 For 30
Sports.description: Original audio documentaries from the makers of the acclaimed 30 for 30 series.

Sports.name: Only A Game
Sports.description: An award-winning weekly sports magazine hosted by veteran NPR commentator Bill Littlefield.

Sports.name: Mike & Mike
Sports.description: Mike Greenberg and Mike Golic break down the top news, games and drama throughout the sports world.

Sports.name: Fantasy Focus Football
Sports.description: ESPN fantasy experts Matthew Berry and Field Yates provide daily strategy, previews, overviews and injury reports.

Sports.name: The Herd with Colin Cowherd
Sports.description: The Herd with Colin Cowherd is a thought-provoking, opinionated, and topic-driven journey through the top sports stories of the day.

Sports.name: Daily Fantasy Football Podcast
Sports.description: The best Daily Fantasy Football content for DraftKings and FanDuel contests can now be found on the podcast channel from the world’s leading daily fantasy sports website.

Sports.name: PTI
Sports.description: Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon face off in the nation's capital on the day's hottest topics.

Sports.name: Adam Schefter's Know Them From Adam
Sports.description: Adam Schefter talks with the biggest names in and around football, taking you inside what makes them tick and how they got to where they are.

Sports.name: Jim Rome's Daily Jungle
Sports.description: A new show. Fresh content. A different beast.

Sports.name: Laces Out
Sports.description: What would it sound like if two NFL greats and a football writer got together to discuss everything in the NFL worth talking about and lots more stuff that isn't?

Sports.name: Pardon My Take
Sports.description: Big Cat & PFT Commenter deliver the loudest and most correct sports takes in the history of the spoken word.
